ing: 4 cups fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into 3/4-inch pieces
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Creamy green bean soup my mother always made from fresh green beans out of the garden!"
ins: Place the water, ham,  green beans, potatoes, and onions into a large saucepan or soup pot, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer until the ham and vegetables are very tender, about 45 minutes. Skim off any excess fat. Pour in the cream, season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve.
